title: BlackScreen after Champ-select
body:
So, all Post i saw on this bug were old and didnt work. (explaining the bug): I get into champ select everything is fine,but then a black screen appears for loading screen and in game. I hear the actual game (every single voice /interaction) i am pretty frustrated cause i´m trying to fix that bug like already 1 week.
thankful for every single comment^^
Piebaldi.
